attributes.action: Direct Primary Authorities to develop brownfield sites and not allow building on greenfields
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are all haveing to pay very high prices for food, and this is mainly to do with the dash for Bio Fuels,but in a few years time we will need all the farm land we can get to feed, not just our own people, but others who have lost land via over development and flooding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
